meanings.definition: The act of exposing one's body to the sun for the purpose of tanning or relaxation.
meanings.sent1: Sunbathing can help you get a nice tan.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy sunbathing at the beach during summer.
meanings.sent3: She fell asleep while sunbathing and got a funny sunburn.
meanings.sent4: The garden was sunbathing under the warm rays of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The cat's favorite activity is sunbathing on the windowsill.

meanings.definition: To lie in the sun in order to tan or relax.
meanings.sent1: I often see people sunbathing by the pool.
meanings.sent2: During vacation, we spent hours sunbathing on the deck.
meanings.sent3: The dog loves sunbathing in the backyard and always looks so content.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden were sunbathing in the afternoon sun.
meanings.sent5: After swimming, she likes to sunbathe on the warm sand.
